com.google.publicalerts.cap
Class CachedSaxInputSource

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.InputSource
      com.google.publicalerts.cap.CachedSaxInputSource

public class CachedSaxInputSource
extends InputSource

An implementation of InputSource that allows source content to be read multiple times. This class completely consumes and closes all underlying data streams.

The driving motivation for this class is our need to read a document's CAP Alert XMLNS prior to actually parsing the document.

Call reset() in-between uses. There is no need to close the encapsulated streams: since they are already cached, they will simply be garbage collected when they're no longer needed.

Method Summary
 void reset()
          Resets streams to their initial positions.
